Module count
Package count.matek

Interface DiscreteDistribution

All Known Implementing Classes:
NegativeBinomial, PointDistribution, Poisson, ShiftedGeometric
public interface DiscreteDistribution
Common interface for working with probabilistic distributions.
Since:
March 20, 2008, 10:41 AM
Author:
csuros

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getNumParameters()
    Returns the number of parameters for defining the distribution: same as the length for the array returned by getParameters()
    double[] getParameters()
    Returns the distribution's parameters: depends on the implementation what they mean
    double[] getPointMassFunction​(int n)
    Returns the first few elements of the probability mass function
    void setParameter​(int parameter_idx, double value)
    Sets one of the distribution parameters

  • Method Details

    • getPointMassFunction

      double[] getPointMassFunction​(int n)
      Returns the first few elements of the probability mass function
      Parameters:
      n - limit on how far the probabilities are computed
      Returns:
      array of n+1 elements: [p0 p1 ... pn]

    • getParameters

      double[] getParameters()
      Returns the distribution's parameters: depends on the implementation what they mean

    • setParameter

      void setParameter​(int parameter_idx, double value)
      Sets one of the distribution parameters
      Parameters:
      parameter_idx - index of the parameter (parameters are indexed the same order as with getParameters())
      value - New value of the parameter

    • getNumParameters

      int getNumParameters()
      Returns the number of parameters for defining the distribution: same as the length for the array returned by getParameters()
